产品标题（必填）: 2021 NEW HOT Mini Full-HD 1080P Small Wifi Camera Wifi IP Mini Camera IR Night Vision Micro Camera Motion
产品描述（必填）:
Feature:
1. With intelligent motion detection technology, you can manually adjust sensor sensitivity. Once the motion is detected, the camera will send a push notification with an image to your phone. You can log in to the application to see what is happening in real time and never worry about missing something important.

2. This wireless WiFi camera will never miss a detail with professional-grade night vision. Designed with hidden 6 IR lights, with non-luminance and 5m night vision distance, you can remote control to switch on/off on the App.

3. The camera is one of the world smallest camera, with size 0.9x1.69x1.69inch and weight 1oz, work on 2.4GHz WiFi, perfect to keep an eye your kids, families, or important things. Suitable for home, office, store, car, even in your pocket or on your backpack with a strong magnet. It can work as a security camera, car camcorder, pet camera and baby camera.

4. 2.0MP camera for 1920x1080P 25fps HD video with accurate color reproduction. You can check real time video via iOS/Android smartphone, tablet or PC. This WiFi camera has 150degree wide-angle lens, perfect for house, office or family as a housekeeper, nanny cam, baby camera and pet camera.

5. Equipped with a high-quality 300mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery for 1hour continuous HD video recording, support charge and record at the same time. Support external micro-SD card for max 128GB(card not included), can be used for meeting room, car, travel, shops, cycling, gymnasium.

Specifications:

Color: Black, White
Size: 0.9x1.69x1.69inch

Night Vision Range: 5m
Camera: 2.0MP
